paper_abstract: This article describes the activity of R in the 2011 Google Summer of Code (GSoC), which Wikipedia describes as follows. The Google Summer of Code (GSoC) is an annual program, first held from May to August 2005, in which Google awards stipends (of 5000 USD, as of 2010) to hundreds of students who successfully complete a requested free or open source software coding project during the summer.
paper_title: R's Participation in the Google Summer of Code 2011
